description.oldValue:
A
simplified compose box UI will make it easier to create and send messages. Edit
your message, insert an emoji or call Copilot right from the compose box, or
click on the plus button to choose from the extended menu of actions.
description.newValue: A simplified compose box UI will make it easier to create and send messages. Edit your message, insert an emoji or call Copilot right from the compose box, or click on the plus button to choose from the extended menu of actions. Note: This is for the new Teams experience only.
